(b) A square loop of wire with nonnegligible resistance is placed in the same plane as Wire <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Wire <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>. (c)
